events.name: GDG Port Harcourt Google I/O Extended 17
events.description:
Google I/O is an annual developer festival held at the outdoor Shoreline Amphitheater, in San Francisco. GDG Port Harcourt is happy to host I/O Extended, an event that will bring students, tech enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and local developer communities together in Port Harcourt to experience the Google I/O keynotes and sessions with one another, it will also present an opportunity to discuss tech and network. 

There will be codelab and speaker sessions, anyone with a good tech solution will be given the opportunity to Demo his or her project to attendees. Their will be sessions on Android development, Google Cloud platform, Firebase, Progressive Web App and Polymer.

events.name: Women TechMakers Port Harcourt Design Sprint Event
events.description:
Women TechMakers Port Harcourt, powered by GDG Port Harcourt, will be organizing a Design Sprint event. This meetup will be a 4-hours process for answering critical business questions through design, prototyping, and testing ideas with customers. Originally developed at Google Ventures, it's a “greatest hits” of business strategy, innovation, behavior science, design thinking, and more—packaged into a battle-tested process that any team can use. The sprint also helps in creative brainstorming that results in multiple possible solutions and convergent thinking using defined, logical steps to arrive at one solution. 

The meetup is for developers, IT enthusiasts, Entrepreneurs in Port Harcourt.

events.name: GDG Port Harcourt Firebase for Web Development Meetup
events.description:
GDG Port Harcourt is happy to host her next meetup, a Firebase for Web App development event. As part of the pre-DevFestSE17 preparation meetups, we'll be exploring the Google Firebase Technology for Web Development. Firebase is an app-development platform on Google Cloud, that helps you build better mobile, web apps and helps you grow your business. The platform has the below features and more:

• Realtime Database

• Authentication

• Cloud Storage

• Hosting

• Cloud Messaging

There will be speaker sessions, codelab and networking.

Agenda will be shared soon, please prepare to attend. RSVP to attend.

events.name: GDG DevFestSE17

venue.name: EL-Dorado
venue.address_1: the El-Dorado Event Center Aba-Owerri Road Aba

events.description: The GDG Devfest Southern and Eastern Nigeria brings together the world class experts in Android, Web, Cloud and other Google Technologies. DevFestSE Aba 2017 is crafted to be a phenomenal atmosphere for every developer, tech enthusiat, enterprenuer, student and Google expert across Nigeria in the commercial city of Aba.

events.name: GDG Port Harcourt Mobile Web Certification Study Jam 2018
events.description:
• What we'll do
Want to get started and certified in Mobile Web Development! but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Mobile Web Certification Study Jam 2018! Many people learn better when they learn in groups. Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area.

Why do I need great mobile web skills?

Mobile now accounts for over half of all web traffic. Users expect their small-screen experiences to be as quick and intuitive as those on desktop. But making the mobile web fast and easy takes some special skills. We are going to have approximately 3-4 hours of study material, followed by 90 minute (multiple choice) professional accreditation exam offered by Google, After which a Mobile Site Certificate will be awarded to successful students that pass the exam.

• What to bring
Laptop and a learning attitude

• Important to know

events.name: GDG Port Harcourt Google Cloud Study Jam 2018
events.description:
• What we'll do
Want to get started on the Google Cloud Platform, but don't know where to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.

Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.

Agenda:
10:00am: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
12:00pm: Break
12:30pm: Intro to Docker or Scientific Data Processing lab
2:30pm: Event ends

• What to bring
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)!
The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers.

• Important to know
For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed

events.name: IWD Women Techmakers PH 2018
events.description:
• What we'll do
International Women’s Day, which is marked on March 8th every year, is a one day celebrate to celebrate the achievements of women in all area of their career within our community. In order to commemorate International Women's Day, the Women techmakers Port Harcourt brings together women in ICT, who can contribute to the development of the Women Tech community in Port Harcourt. The event is a one day celebration to celebrate the achievements of women in all area of their career within our community and to share ideas.

• What to bring
Laptops and writing materials

• Important to know
If you have an extension, please do come with it.
Location will be communicated to you very soon.

events.name: GDG Port Harcourt I/O Extended
events.description:
• What we'll do
Google I/O is the biggest developer event for googlers and google developers. The extended is an event for googlers and google developers from anywhere in the world to connect to the main event giving an opportunity for developers to be part of the global experience. The event is an avenue for developers to learn about new technologies and updates about Google tools and products that will help in building the next big app,supporting ideas and growing business. The extended event at GDG Port Harcourt will be an event for local developers to learn,network and showcase new ideas and product that they are working on.

We’ll also be introducing Flutter, Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source. We’ll be running 2 Flutter Codelabs.

• What to bring
Laptop

• Important to know
Come with your laptops and install Android Studio before coming. This will be used for the Flutter CodeLab session

events.name: GDG Port Harcourt Flutter Study Jam 2018
events.description:
Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

Study Jams are a great opportunity to bring members of your community together to learn Flutter in person and support them to complete the course. Everyone, who completes the course will get a Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge.

WHO?
Flutter Study Jam is suited best for:
1) those just getting started with mobile app development
2) those with programming experience on other mobile app frameworks.

Udacity
https://www.udacity.com/course/build-native-mobile-apps-with-flutter--ud905

Intro to Flutter
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1xlLczLZpew-bsYWIou5IwOYH49CqWalgsluy3PRsplA/edit

Flutter Docs
https://flutter.io/docs/

Agenda:
11:00 AM: Flutter Udacity Course Introduction
11:30 PM: Udacity Course Lesson 1
12:30 PM: Break/Refreshment
01:00 PM: Udacity Course Lesson 1 continue
03:00 PM: Event ends

events.description: The UI/UX Masterclass is Organized by Women Techmakers Port Harcourt with the aim of training those interested in going into UI/UX design and designing a product at the end of the training. events.name: Google Cloud Study Jams [Internet of Things]
events.description:
Lets get Jamming!

3 weeks of Internet of Things on the Google Cloud Platform!!!

-Learn the basics of Internet of Things on the Google Cloud Platform
-Meet IoT veterans for mentorship on real-life applications of IoT
-Get Free access to Qwiklabs hands-on labs
-Earn Google Cloud badges to show your skills and expertise

events.name: IWD Women Techmakers Port Harcourt
events.description:
Women Techmakers Port Harcourt IWD

As part of our mission to increase visibility, community, and resources for women in technology.
In conjunction with International Women’s Day on March 8th, we’ll be celebrating International Women's Day in Google's way.
The summits will feature speakers, panel discussions, hands-on workshops, and
networking, all centered around celebrating the contributions of women in tech.
Of course, in true Google fashion, there will be plenty of food and giveaways.
